job_details.experience_required: Proven experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role.
job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Raghuteja, W3Global raghu.miriyala@w3global.com Reply to: raghu.miriyala@w3global.com Data Developer/EngineerConyers, Georgia, LTTS US BranchFulltime (No Contract) JOB DESCRIPTIONJob Description & Skill Requirement::We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong backgroundin SQL and Power BI, with a passion for data management, analysis, and visualization. Key Responsibilities:1. Develop and maintain SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions.2. Design and implement data models to support reporting and analytics.3. Create interactive and visually appealing dashboards and reports using Power BI.4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions.5. Monitor and troubleshoot data issues, ensuring data quality and reliability.6. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data engineering and business intelligence.Qualifications:1. Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.2. Proven experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role.3. Strong proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL).4. Hands-on experience with Power BI, including data modeling, report/dashboard creation.5. Familiarity with ETL tools and processes.6. Knowledge of data warehousing concepts and best practices.7. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.8. Strong communication and collaboration skills.9. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.EXPERTISE AND QUALIFICATIONSSQL Server, Power BI,
